channel.title: CVE Feed for Contec Co., Ltd. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Contec Co., Ltd. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-22334|2024-08-02T10:07:06.217Z -- contec%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- conprosys%20hmi%20system%20%28chs%29
item.description: Use of password hash instead of password for authentication vulnerability in CONPROSYS HMI System (CHS) Ver.3.4.5 and earlier allows a remote authenticated attacker to obtain user credentials information via a man-in-the-middle attack.

item.title: CVE-2023-22373|2024-08-02T10:07:06.504Z -- contec%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- conprosys%20hmi%20system%20%28chs%29
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in CONPROSYS HMI System (CHS) Ver.3.4.5 and earlier allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script and obtain the sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2023-22324|2024-08-02T10:07:06.179Z -- contec%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- conprosys%20hmi%20system%20%28chs%29
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in the CONPROSYS HMI System (CHS) Ver.3.5.0 and earlier allows a remote authenticated attacker to execute an arbitrary SQL command. As a result, information stored in the database may be obtained.

item.title: CVE-2023-22339|2024-08-02T10:07:06.134Z -- contec%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- conprosys%20hmi%20system%20%28chs%29
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in CONPROSYS HMI System (CHS) Ver.3.4.5 and earlier allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to bypass access restriction and obtain the server certificate including the private key of the product.

item.title: CVE-2023-22331|2024-08-02T10:07:06.252Z -- contec%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- conprosys%20hmi%20system%20%28chs%29
item.description: Use of default credentials vulnerability in CONPROSYS HMI System (CHS) Ver.3.4.5 and earlier allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to alter user credentials information.
